1.title: priority-box
1.subtitle: a mobile application for productivity
1.text: A mobile app that helps take the thinking out of decision-making but using our exponential ranking algorithm to assess the impact of your decisions on your life's priorities.

2.title: hot-button-twitter-search
2.subtitle: search tweets by political relevance
2.text: How do you separate someone's topical tweets from their tweets about everything else? Hot Button is a new way to search Twitter. Hot Button scans news headlines to identify political topics, and then allows you to sort a user's tweets by their relevancy to recent news. Hot Button's comparisons between news headlines and a user's tweets are powered by scikit-learn!
